original_text: Rahab, who had been a prostitute in Jericho, also trusted God. She helped the men from Israel who had come to that city earlier. They wanted to discover how to attack the city. Rahab was kind to them. As a result of her faith, she did not die with all the other people in Jericho who did not obey God.
korean_text: 믿음으로 기생 라합은 정탐꾼을 평안히 영접하였으므로 순종하지 아니한 자와 함께 멸망하지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: Rahab, who had been a prostitute in Jericho
She helped the men from Israel
who had come to that city earlier
They wanted to discover how to attack the city
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어떻게 그 도시를 공격할지 알고 싶었습니다

sentences.original_text: As a result of her faith
she did not die with all the other people in Jericho
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 여리고의 다른 모든 사람들과 함께 죽지 않았습니다
